data.name: Neptunia Virtual Stars - Towa Kiseki - Vtuber Accessories
data.detailed_description:
Gain items and accessories inspired by Vtuber Towa Kiseki.
・Towa Kiseki Mask x 3
・Towa Kiseki-themed accessories x 3
data.about_the_game:
Gain items and accessories inspired by Vtuber Towa Kiseki.
・Towa Kiseki Mask x 3
・Towa Kiseki-themed accessories x 3
data.short_description: Gain items and accessories inspired by Vtuber Towa Kiseki.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 / R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
